62 #ifdef SHMDEBUG
63 struct ShmDebugInfo {
64  shm_name_t name;
65  shm_handle_t handle;
66  char deleted;
67  char type;
68 
69  ShmDebugInfo(char type='\0', const std::string &name = "", shm_handle_t handle = 0)
70  : handle(handle)
71  , deleted(0)
72  , type(type)
73  {
74  memset(this->name, '\0', sizeof(this->name));
75  strncpy(this->name, name.c_str(), sizeof(this->name)-1);
76  }
77 };
78 #endif

80 template<typename T>
81 struct shm {
82 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
83  typedef vistle::default_init_allocator<T> allocator;
84  typedef std::basic_string<T> string;
85  typedef std::vector<T> vector;
86  typedef vistle::shm_array<T, allocator> array;
87  typedef array *array_ptr;
88  struct Constructor {
89  std::string name;
90 
91  Constructor(const std::string &name);
92  ~Constructor();
93  template<typename... Args>
94  T *operator()(Args&&... args);
95  };
96  static Constructor construct(const std::string &name) {
97  return Constructor(name);
98  }
99 #else
100  typedef boost::interprocess::allocator<T, managed_shm::segment_manager> allocator;
101  typedef boost::interprocess::basic_string<T, std::char_traits<T>, allocator> string;
102  typedef boost::interprocess::vector<T, allocator> vector;
103  typedef vistle::shm_array<T, allocator> array;
104  typedef boost::interprocess::offset_ptr<array> array_ptr;
105  static typename managed_shm::segment_manager::template construct_proxy<T>::type construct(const std::string &name);
106 #endif
107  static T *find(const std::string &name);
108  static bool destroy(const std::string &name);
109  static T *find_and_ref(const std::string &name); // as find, but reference array
110  static bool destroy_array(const std::string &name, array_ptr arr);
111 };

209 
210 template<typename T>
211 T *shm<T>::find(const std::string &name) {
212 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
213  Shm::the().lockDictionary();
214  auto &dict = Shm::the().m_objectDictionary;
215  auto it = dict.find(name);
216  if (it == dict.end()) {
217  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
218  return nullptr;
219  }
220  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
221  return static_cast<T *>(it->second);
222 #else
223  return Shm::the().shm().find<T>(name.c_str()).first;
224 #endif
225 }
226 
227 template<typename T>
228 T *shm<T>::find_and_ref(const std::string &name) {
229 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
230  Shm::the().lockDictionary();
231  T *t = shm<T>::find(name);
232  if (t)
233  t->ref();
234  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
235  return t;
236 #else
237  Shm::the().lockObjects();
238  T *t = shm<T>::find(name);
239  if (t) {
240  t->ref();
241  assert(t->refcount() > 0);
242  }
243  Shm::the().unlockObjects();
244  return t;
245 #endif
246 }
247 
248 template<typename T>
249 bool shm<T>::destroy(const std::string &name) {
250 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
251  Shm::the().lockDictionary();
252  auto &dict = Shm::the().m_objectDictionary;
253  auto it = dict.find(name);
254  bool ret = true;
255  if (it == dict.end()) {
256  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
257  std::cerr << "WARNING: shm: did not find object " << name << " to be deleted" << std::endl;
258  ret = false;
259  } else {
260  T *t = static_cast<T *>(it->second);
261  dict.erase(it);
262  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
263  delete t;
264  }
265 #else
266  const bool ret = Shm::the().shm().destroy<T>(name.c_str());
267 #endif
268  Shm::the().markAsRemoved(name);
269  return ret;
270 }
271 
272 template<typename T>
273 bool shm<T>::destroy_array(const std::string &name, shm<T>::array_ptr arr) {
274 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
275  Shm::the().lockDictionary();
276  if (arr->refcount() > 0) {
277  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
278  return true;
279  }
280  bool ret = shm<shm<T>::array>::destroy(name);
281  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
282  return ret;
283 #else
284  Shm::the().lockObjects();
285  if (arr->refcount() > 0) {
286  Shm::the().unlockObjects();
287  return true;
288  }
289  assert(arr->refcount() == 0);
290  bool ret = shm<shm<T>::array>::destroy(name);
291  Shm::the().unlockObjects();
292  return ret;
293 #endif
294 }
295 
296 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
297 template<typename T>
298 shm<T>::Constructor::Constructor(const std::string &name): name(name) {
299  Shm::the().lockDictionary();
300 }
301 
302 template<typename T>
303 shm<T>::Constructor::~Constructor() {
304  Shm::the().unlockDictionary();
305 }
306 
307 template<typename T>
308 template<typename... Args>
309 T *shm<T>::Constructor::operator()(Args&&... args) {
310  auto &dict = Shm::the().m_objectDictionary;
311  auto it = dict.find(name);
312  if (it != dict.end()) {
313  std::cerr << "WARNING: shm: already have " << name << std::endl;
314  return reinterpret_cast<T *>(it->second);
315  }
316 
317  T *t = new T(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
318  dict[name] = t;
319  return t;
320 }
321 #endif
322
